headline: User Interface Developer at Siemens Corporate Research

values.summary:
(1) Developed front end prototypes and products, with technologies including HTML5, CSS3, Object Oriented JavaScript, WPF, Flex, ActionScript, PHP, Node.js, D3 etc., from desktop to mobile, in-browser or standalone. 
(2) Provided consulting to prototyping and developing needs for 20+ projects across 4 sectors Siemens. 
(3) Led 3 mobile UX projects including activities from requirements and design to development and deployment. 
(4) Designed and conducted 3 usability testings with wireframes and prototypes on mobile devices. 
(5) Led knowledge sharing activities within our multi-disciplinary team.  
(6) Recruited and managed more than 20 interns, two of which converted to full-time employees.
values.title: Front End Developer

values.summary:
(1) Developed software prototypes that showcase innovative user interactions and UI concepts. 
(2) Implemented and delivered code in support of customer product managers. 
(3) Provided supporting in prototyping activities and technology advancement within UX group.
(4) Recruited and managed interns for UX group.

values.description: Conference Navigator is a personal conference scheduling tool with social linking and recommendation features. The system is developed as part of a NSF-supported project by Dr. Brusilovsky from the University of Pittsburgh iSchool. Users can control access to their information. My part in the team was interaction design and front-end+middle layer developing using jQuery and PHP.
values.name: Conference Navigator

values.description:
- A public touchscreen display system providing research talks, events, announcements, jobs and other useful information to iSchool.
- Designed and developed with Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Flash Catalyst, Flex framework.
-Users can view different categories of information and send interesting information in email, either to themselves or to their friends. Authorized users can also publish announcements to the screen via a blog.
-The system updates the latest information every 10 minutes and is easy configurable that only requires internet connection on the running machine.
values.name: Touch the iSchool

values.description: A touchscreen application providing useful information to new students
values.name: iSchool New Student Welcome Touchscreen App

values.description: A just-for-fun animated Ajax-powered Flickr app to discover interesting photos by tags on Flickr.
values.name: Flickr Twinkle

values.description: A computer game using webcam to capture userâ€™s motion and interact with the user (designed and developed before Microsoft Kinect). Technologies used include Microsoft XNA framework(C#) and OpenCV.
values.name: Motion-based Interactive Game

values.description: Innovatively integrated Yahoo! Pipe and Eventur (http://eventur.us) RSS to Facebook page to automatically update cultural events in Pittsburgh. Boosted visits to Eventur website by 10 times with social network power.
values.name: Eventur Facebook Page

summary:
View my website at http://shaopeng.us

About me:
(1) Expert knowledge in Front End Development. 
(2) Professional in User Experience Design, with project leading experience. 
(3) Project experience in latest front end technology (Object Oriented JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, Bootstrap, jQuery), as well as back end technology (Node.js, Express, PHP, MySQL, MongoDB). 
(4) Always passionate about doing mash up with different technologies like using Flickr API or LinkedIn API sitting on Amazon EC2 cloud, or just a static GitHub page. 
(5) Loves photography as a hobby. On Flickr Explore 7 times. My photostream: http://www.flickr.com/photos/47894230@N06/
